import {useState} from "react"; export const Form = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState ({ recipeName:"", summary:"", healtScore:"", steps:"", image:"", diet:"", }) const changeHandler = (event) =>{ //me trae informacion de donde estoy disparando el evento. Que input disparo el evento. const property = event.target.name const value = event.target.value setForm({...form, [property] : value}) } return (
) } export default Form
